doc.field: Caisse Nationale des Telecommunications is issuing a 20 billion yen eurobond due May 29, 1992 paying 4-3/8 pct and priced at 101-1/2 pct, lead manager IBJ International Ltd said. The non-callable bond is available in denominations of one mln yen and is guaranteed by France. The selling concession is 1-1/4 pct while management and underwriting combined pays 5/8 pct. The payment date is May 29 and the issue will be listed in Luxembourg. REUTER
